api_list.name: getAddressBalance
api_list.description: get your or others address balance
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dextools-api.p.rapidapi.com/balance/0x742d35Cc6634C0532925a3b844Bc454e4438f44e"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dextools-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dextools-api.p.rapidapi.com/balance/{address}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dextools-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
